extendedInfo.description: English Language.LDS Gospel Art Picture Kit is a set of more than 160 images depicting the Life of Jesus Christ, and paintings of Prophets and other characters from the Scriptures. You can use these pictures for learning and teaching at home or at church.The Images in the Gospel Art Book are organized into six sections: Old Testament, New Testament, Book of Mormon, Church History, Gospel in Action, and Latter-day Prophets. Future Development:- Scroll or Swipe to view Prev/Next Image.- More Images- Summary and scripture references- Suggestions Welcome! Please send your comments to make this App. better.Copyright notice:This is only a dedicated browserImages and references:https://www.lds.orgOfficial Web site of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day SaintsÂ© 2010 Intellectual Reserve, Inc. All rights reserved.Tags: LDS, SUD, Latter Day Saints, Scriptures, LDS Gospel Library, LDS Tools, Ensign, Mormones, Mormon channel, LDS Gospel Art Book, Deseret Bookshelf, Musical Instruments for Kids

reviews.title: The app is good for home and church
reviews.comment: This app is great for easy access to the pictures for Family Home Evening, Sunday School Lesions and any other time you might want them.
reviews.author: Abinadi Black

reviews.title: A great start
reviews.comment: I love having the pictures available on my tablet. I wish you could swipe from picture to picture. I also wish you could use a full screen mode so all you see is the picture.  I will re-rate the app with the next version.
reviews.author: Paul Pehrson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is great to have the pics for FHE. We used it tonight for our lesson. Looking forward to an update with swiping and a summary of each pic; then this app will be top notch and 5 stars!
reviews.author: Gilbert Cazier
